app_detail:
Welcome to drive animal cargo transport truck on the hilly offroad tracks ğŸ™ƒğŸ˜Š! Do you like the animal transport trailer cargo truck driving on crazy offroad hilly tracks??? Yes? Are you waiting for this kind of games?? You must be happy to know that offroad farm animal transportation game is here for you. 

Be a best livestock transport cargo truck transporter and show off your craze about offroad farm animals. Letâ€™s start your offroad driving adventurous journey. Simply load the offroad farm animals on the trailer cargo truck to transport them to fields. Take full responsibility of you heavy duty of farm animal cargo transportation.

Fasten your seat belt and go with the animal safari transport truck simulator game to become the skilled animal safari transport cargo transporter truck driver. Download this animal long trailer cargo truck simulator game now and have fun!

Features: 
Many safari animals like goat, horse, sheep, bull, cow and ram to transport.
Pick the animals from given location.
Drop safari transport animals to destination.
Be a best animal cargo trailer truck transporter.
Stunning 3D visual graphics with real physical effects.
Addictive synchronized background music.
Smooth gameplay control.
